#summary jPlurk version 2
#labels Featured

= About jPlurk V2  =

jPlurk v2 is developing now.

jPlurk v1 has been frozen because Plurk released the Official [http://www.plurk.com/API Plurk API]. And now, we propose the new architecture of jPlurk.
